mapper.select: SELECT strRmtypeID FROM RMTYPE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE intIdx = ${intRmIdx} AND intAID = ${intAID}
SELECT strPkgCode, strLocalCode FROM PLNDSTAY.dbo.ACM_PACKAGE_INFO WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE intIdx = ${intPkgIdx}

select ali.strLocalCode from ACM_LOCAL_INFO ali with(nolock) inner join ACCOMM acm with(nolock) on left(ali.strLocalCode, 2) = LEFT(acm.strPropertyID, 2) where acm.intAID = ${intAID} and ali.strFlag = '02' group by ali.strLocalCode
select intAID from ACCOMM with(nolock) where strCateCode = '02' and strDeleteYn = 'N' and strViewYn ='Y'

select intRmIdx, strMapCode from RM_PACKAGE_MAPPING with(nolock) where intAID = ${intAID} and dateMapping > getdate() and dateMapping < DATEADD(day, 100, GETDATE()) and strDeleteYn = 'N' group by intRmIdx, strMapCode
select a.strLocalCode from ACM_LOCAL_INFO a with(nolock) inner join ACCOMM_ACM_LOCAL b with(nolock) on a.intIdx = b.intALIIdx where intAID = ${intAID} group by a.strLocalCode
